c74object.name: tap.sift~
c74object.digest: Sift out desired samples and send at control-rate
c74object.description: The tap.sift~ object processes an MSP audio signal and only lets the desired sample value(s) pass through. The value(s) that is/are passed through are done so in the control domain.

objarg.name: value
objarg.description: Sets the initial value which is sifted out from the rest.

objarg.name: mode
objarg.description: Sets the initial mode (signal or floating-point output).
